values:
yep, so i'm back from the dead...or boot camp whatever you want to call it. it was a long good experience, i'm so glad i went through with it. i guess some things have happened since i've last updated... i got my own place, still in butler i'm engaged and maybe just maybe expecting a bundle of joy. i might be moving to new jersey, but i'm not sure yet. ken and i are no longer an item. he's still in iraq. we've remained good friends since we've broken up. it's just too hard to have a long distance relationship with someone like that so far away. we've actually argued quite a bit. he was/is too stressed over there to maintain such a new relationship. at the time we were talking about getting back together once he came back, but we BOTH decided to hold off and see how we feel once he comes home, which won't be for another 6 months atleast. also...the little bundle of joy i'm expecting...yeah not quite sure if he's the father or not...but that's all i have to say about that situation, and i'll now return to my private life. 

okay so i feel like including my list of things i want to do before i expire...
1. see every state and us terrority
2. be deployed
3. get married
4. have kids
5. get a good job
6. finish college
7. buy a brand new car
8. do something completely self-less
9. volunteer my time for something great
10. save someone

well everyone, the time i've been waiting for since 10 july 04 has come. i leave tomorrow morning for basic training. i'll miss all you guys, and since i made my last entry somewhat sappy, i won't repeat myself! :) take care of yourselves and remember to write me!!!!

 

good bye

4 days!!!

well i come online today to find out that my baby had a conversation with my gram. he was so respectful to her, what he didn't know was that she saved the conversation to show me. if there was ever any doubt in my mind, it's gone after seeing what he said about me. even if his duty tour got extended, we're still going to try to get married when he comes home, and eventually start our family. :) me with a baby... oh well, i have things to do... later ya'll

my christmas was awesome! i got myself a new camcorder, some clothes, 2 pretty crosses, and my new fantastic coat! there was only one thing missing...HIM! i miss him like crazy, and i'm going to miss him even more when i'm gone. i got my hair cut...it looks cute, even though it's short and i took my pregnency test today. but other than that everything is boring!

well i'm getting close...only 6 days. i honestly remember the day i enlisted. it doesn't seem that long ago, now i'm about to leave my friends and family behind. not all of them understand why i'm choosing to do this. some of them just won't understand at all... i'm not going to regret joining the air force, even if i grow to hate it. even then, i will still be able to say proudly that i completed something only a tiny fraction of people, especially women, can do. people ask me if i'm nervous...OF COURSE, why wouldn't i be nervous? i'm leaving my comfort zone of friends and family so i can get yelled at by an instructer because every little thing i do and say is wrong. my parents keep telling me that i can change my mind, that i don't have to go. i know i don't have to...but i want to. this has been my dream since i was practically a baby. every generation in my family has had someone in the military. i get the honor of breaking that tradition, by being the first female in my family to join. i've gotten nothing but tons of love and support from the people that matter most to me. even when i've thought about giving up and backing out, they talked me out of it. for that i will be eternally greatful.

 

someone once told me that you get only one guardian angel. now this is going to sound silly, but he was wrong. i won't go into too much detail, but lets just say that i know that i have multiple angels here, and waiting for me in heaven. now before this turns into a sappy little post going into too much emotion, let me just say that i will miss all of you. even the people that i know only through my lj. take care of yourselfs, as i will take care of myself to the best of my ability. in a year from now, who knows where any of us will be...i just hope that by this time next year everyone will be safe from harm...ok that's enough now... i'm going to lay down.. good night everyone *muah*

okay, so i know i read way too much into things, but i can't help it when i log on yahoo and see "there's something we need to talk about. don't worry it's not something completely horrible." what the hell does that mean? if he breaks my heart, i'm gonna kill him.

anyways

i have to take my pregnency test next tuesday, i'm pretty sure i have nothing to worry about! damnit, now this shit with him is goign to be on my mind until i talk to him again, which who knows when that will be considering he didn't get on last night like he usually does. damnit now i'm getting pissed!

yeah so it's december and it's too freaking cold. i cant wait til i get to texas! even if i will be getting yelled at, it's so much better than the damn cold. my finals are almost over. my speech was borderline retarded, "what is the most remarkable gadget i own" i seriously sat in the "ghetto green room" and did nothing. so i walk in and go "the most remarkable gadget? uh my cell phone." it sucked, and it was only 1:07 long, oh well more lost points there. oh well, time to waste more time before my computer final, later ya'll!

so i was on the phone with my man last night :) and he knew i was tired, but i didn't want to get off the phone with him. well he tells me to get in bed and grab the teddy bear he gave me, and i did of course. well we're talking and next thing i know he's telling me to close my eyes and he was talking about how he wishes he was there in bed with me. stroking my hair like he always does. so anyways, he starts singing to me. nothing fancy, just a simple lullaby. i thought that was soooo sweet. well next thing i know i was asleep still holding the phone. he left me an e-mail i guess after we hung up. he said that he loved me and he couldn't wait til he was back home with me in his arms again. awwww it's official this guy can't get any better. i think i can get used to being his queen. :) how did i get so lucky? and in case you're reading this....like i know you do i love you sweetheart. i'll be on tonight like always. *muah* later ya'll

...i'm so in love with him...

wow it's the end of a semester already. i got finals, and this time... i'm ready for them. i actually don't even need to take my finals in 2 of my classes, b/c it won't affect me A. :) which is awesome. oh well, i have stuff to do and people to talk to. later ya'll! addresses...i need them NOW!

alright so i guess this is the obligatory i'm sad post. he left yesterday morning. i just stood at the air port and watched him walk past security. i tried not to let him see me cry. the last thing i want is for him to see that i'm upset. i watched him pack his things the night before. i won't get to see him again until.... well i just don't know when i'll get to see him again. and that's not the only thing that's on my mind...

i'm getting scared. part of me isn't sure i'm ready for this whole boot camp thing. i'm not going to back out of it. it is what i want. it's just going to  be hard going though all that mental/physical challenge without any loved ones around me at all. i know they will all be with me in spirit. i do want to take a moment to say thank you to all my friends who have been there for me over the years. the ones that have put up with all of my b.s. i wouldn't be the person i am today, without you guys. well i guess i should get back to my homework. goodbye ya'll! i have 35 days left... so i better hear from all of you before then!

wow oh my gosh! where do i start. hmm... yesterday was thanksgiving, that was fun. i had 3 turkeys in 24 hours. wednesday night they had "thanksgiving dinner" for us. then i woke up early and went to his parents house. i love his family! then we went to my grandma's. nothing out of the ordinary with that. we didn't go see the lights this year. he was too tired from work. oh i lied! when i said nothing out of the ordinary happened. i'm getting married! when we got to my grandma's house, before we went inside he told me how much he loved me and how even though he was going to iraq, nothing would change between us. then he got down on one knee, told me that he couldn't imagine his life without me and popped the question. my ring is so beautiful. i guess i was the last to know. when we walked inside the first thing everyone asked was to see the ring. it's so wonderful. i love him so much! he told me he wanted to propose on christmas, but he doubts he'll get the chance to come home. then today i had to work. luckly i worked 5-11, so there weren't any more sales. people did keep asking if we had stuff from the ad, too bad we ran out at 10:30 this morning! oh well, i gotta work at 11 tomorrow. so i guess ill go to bed... night ya'll!

omg! i know a secret! hehe vanessa is so awesome! girl i'm excited, now i just have to be patient and wait. you know we're going to have to celebrate this. hmm i might just have to drive down to the ville and suprise you! im so excited! but! of course there's always a but... he has to leave. the week after thanksgiving!! :( well...maybe it'll just be a quick before you go kinda wedding!

well, i don't care anymore. he's kind of childish...so i'm just going to say this. i'm so in love right now. i didn't want to say anything b/c i didn't want to spoil it. but i'm really in love with my man. :) he's wonderful. we already live together. and b/c a certain someone has someone, i'm not going to hide anymore. whatever i'm happy and oh so in love. :) i <3 my army man! :)

im almost flattered by this guy at work. he walked by my department while i was helping an older couple pick out a watch. well, after this guy winked and me and kind of said something (i think he said "hey cutie" but i couldn't hear him) anyway, while he was so obviously checking me out, he walked right into a cart. the cart not only hit a display, nearly knocking it over, but he also walked into Chad and Christina. too bad they walked away shortly before he came back. yes he came back! keep in mind i'm still helping this older couple. well i glance over to let him know that i'll be with him in a second (i have to greet every customer or i'll get in trouble) so i go back to this older couple. they just can't decide what they want, so they tell me to help this kid. so i go over and ask him if i can help him with anything, and he proceeds to ask me about a watch. the question made no sense, i could tell he just made it up. so anyway here's how the rest of our conversation went:

weird guy: so uh, i have my own apartment, my roommate just moved out, and he owed me money so he just gave me his watch. i really don't like it and want to sell it, do you know how much it's worth?

me: it's a bulova, im not sure how much you'll get.

weird guy: well, nah i really didn't want to ask about the watch...i'm seth, what's your name?

me: *points to my name badge* erinn

weird guy: i'm 25 how old are you? * keep in mind, he looks like he's 30 easily, maybe older*

me: i'm only 19.

weird guy: so uh, you single? you cute.

me: thanks, but sorry, i'm not looking for anyone right now.

weird guy: ah i see, well uh, you change your mind...i'll b back

and with that he walked away. he did come back shortly there after to "double check that i wasn't looking"

i couldn't help but laugh, and be a little flattered. cindy and lisa got a good laugh out of that. and i also had a 4 man escort out to my car. i had 2 guys from seasonal, 1 from maintence, and 1 from pets. i found that to be amusing. my big protectors. well, im gonna get back to doing actual work, i just wanted to share. :)

later ya'll!

i've been doing alot of thinking lately about alot of things. one of the things i really can't get out of my mind is SRU. when i first left there i was really sad. after thinking about it, i realized that i was only sad b/c i knew i wasn't going to get to see my friends. over that year i loved and lost, and loved and lost again. i know when i come home from texas i won't be going back to SRU. not only b/c they no longer have my major. just because i really wasn't happy there. im starting to be happy with who i am. i know what i want out of life now. i know who i want in my life and who i really could care less about. i don't know where i'll be going to school when i come home...if i even go to school at all. maybe i'll just work off my job through the air force. i can always get a job at the hospital up here... well for the sake of this turning into a long sappy entry about how i was so miserable, maybe i'll just stop now. before i do, i have to say this though. i will NEVER regret all the fun and memorable times i had up there. i wouldn't trade the friends i made for anything. they are still all so special to me, everyone of them influenced me in some way shape or form. now i really will stop now. :) im going to rest my tired little head now. good night everyone.

Look, to all the people that keep whining and complaining about Bush. I don't care. Quit calling me and leaving me voicemails, quit iming me. I just don't care anymore. I refuse to have a conversation with anyone about politics. Until then, I'm honestly considering blocking everyone. I really can't deal with this ignorance and whining that has been going on since Wednesday. So I'll say this one more time...


KNOCK IT OFF! I DON'T CARE! WAIT 4 MORE YEARS AND TRY AGAIN!

so yes once again i am in the library. my new home away from home. atleast ive started researching for my speech next thursday. "the effects of obesity, and why people should eat right and exercise" kinda boring, i know. i actually had an offer to hang out at joe's house before speech. he's over in the union now. i just don't know if i want to hang out at some guys house. keeping in mind that i barely know the kid. well, i better get back to my research and stuff. later ya'll!

so it seems like im mostly at school when i publicly update this thing anymore. everything has been going pretty well. work kind of sucks, but i only have about a month and a half left before i go on my l.o.a. i am getting kind of nervous, but im ready for this. although it saddens me to leave my family and friends behind, i know im gonna come back. *atleast i hope* but im not going to turn this into a sappy journal entry. but i will take the time to say that i love every special person in my life. i love you all for being so special and unique. especially the ones who have always had my back. i appreciate it more than you could ever know. im not going to sit here and list my regrets either. 1. because i feel that you learn from each mistake you make, and if god didn't want it to happen, it wouldn't. *can you believe me, the now former atheist now talking about god?* i may have loved and lost, but im always willing to love again. i know my mr. right is out there somewhere, and who knows...maybe i've found him already but the timing just wasn't right or something. im not going to detail too much of my personal life on here. simply for the fact that it's my life, if i want to do this, that, or whatever...it's my choice. part of me is sinking back to the person i used to be. the one who just simply can't be bothered with other peoples opinions of me. i don't care what anyone says...this is MY life. and im gonna live it as i choose. of coures im hoping someday it will be in god's plan to make me a wife and mother. but for now...im me, just me. nothing fancy just erinn. :) the person my true friends know. after all if they weren't my true friends, they wouldn't know pretty much everthing about me! what can i say.... I LOVE YOU ALL! well im gonna get back to doing something constructive... hehe later ya'll!

by the way 70 DAYS TIL I LEAVE FOR BOOT!!! 
don't forget, i better get all you're info before i leave. b/c if you don't write me, when i come home ill kicking your asses!

so what can i say? im happy. not just superficial happy, but really happy. i want to say more...but that's not gonna happen. i guess im becoming a little secluded. im trying to figure out where i want to go to school, but there are alot of factors that weren't here before.... the list is too long to even mention. i know what my new major is going to be.... i want to major in criminology with a minor in computer forensics. also, i want to get atleast a certificate in arabic and spanish. im going to be taking on alot! but im ready for it. i have countless people that support me even though they don't have to. well i guess im gonna try to get some sleep. night ya'll!

so i guess my journal has just become a string of short little updates...well except for my private entries...but those are private for a reason! :) vanessa, remember that situation i told you about? well i did it! it's so awesome! i couldn't be happier. i really don't want december to get here though :( it's not cool that he has to leave, but then again i leave in january. everything will be alright though, just gotta have faith. im so happy right now. my cheeks are starting to hurt from smiling! :)~ it's so nice to have something like this. we're still taking our time, but we both get really good vibes...so who knows!!! well i have stuff to do. lata ya'll!

i just finished my algebra midterm...could have been much much worse! im just relaxing in the library for now. im waiting for a few people who are supposed to call me to call. it would make me happy if they did :) *hint hint* i would like to talk to vanessa either on here or over the phone when she gets a chance...but whatever. well i g/2/g. later ya'll!

what's up ya'll? i have midterms this week :( i guess it's not soo bad. my worst one is set for thursday, my algebra midterm! i really dont wanna take it, but atleast it's multiple choice... school was kind of boring today. i reviewed in algebra, and listened to speeches in public speaking. i did my best to avoid andrew all day. i really can't stand that kid, and he just doesn't seem to get the point. it's gotten to the point where i now park my car on the other side of campus so he can't walk with me. i swear if he ever comes to my house im calling the cops. maybe i should just let my friend go after him. oh well, other than that. im off to bed... ive been in the mood to cuddle all day. when i got home from school i just layed on the couch wishing someone was there with me...well good night ya'll! sorry for the lack of excitement, my private entries see all that. :)

i had so much fun at fright farm last night! had the crap scared out of me, but it's all good. the people in our group made it soooo much fun. then i didn't come home last night. :) came home around 3 this afternoon, got a new phone, and went grocery shopping. i had every intention on doing my homework, but nah. i'll do it during the week. well...i got stuff to do and people to see :) later ya'll!

wow! lets see where should i start...? well, first i had my algebra test yesterday, i don't think i did that bad! then i heard a speech professor cancelled class, unfortunately i got my hopes up. jones ended up being at school so i had to give my speech after all. everyone said i did really well. i just have a hard time making eye contact while im giving a speech. jones said i sounded like delilah (ms) the dj that no one likes. atleast that really didn't bother me. i just got done with gym. i did two miles in 20 minutes. now im tired, and i know my legs are going to be sore tomorrow. i'm going to a haunted hayride tomorrow night. i haven't been to one since i was really little, so this should prove to be interesting! well anyway, im getting back to my work. later ya'll!

gosh...it seems like i'm so busy lately. between working extra at wal mart i have 3 tests and a speech due this week. even though i'm busy...i'm in a really good mood. i'm starting to feel like myself again. i'm going back to the person i always knew myself as....the writer. i've taken all my free time and devoted it to my writing. i've even started with my guitar again. no sudden inspiration either. i don't know what i'm gonna do with myself...i have off from class and work tomorrow. actually, i'm gonna finish up my speech tonite and tomorrow. sometimes i really wish i could quit smiling...i know thats an odd statement to make. don't get me wrong, i'm glad that i'm happy. i'm glad that i'm returning to my true self. well i guess i better get back to my paper.
night ya'll


91 DAYS!

it's saturday...i'm bored! my gosh...i'm in a good mood right now. despite all the work i've been doing lately. i'm just happy. everyone is out hunting right now. so i'm kinda alone! yay! freedom from parents and customers!!! gosh i'm in such a good mood! oh well, better get back to work...later ya'll

ya know...there's no greater feeling in the world than driving to school like a maniac b/c for some reason your house lost power...only to find that the class has been cancelled! if this had been last year i would have been thrilled to see the class was cancelled maybe that's because i lived on campus!!! oh well, now i'll just stay in the library til my 2 o'clock...hopefully he (creepy stalker boy) won't find me...oh well, time to get back to my outline! later ya'll!

well my b-day has come and gone...not like it matters. it was my last birthday as a civilian for a while. i don't understand why these people i barely know keep iming me. it cracks me up for the most part. anyways...i've had this song stuck in my head for the past few days...so now i feel the need to post the lyrics and hope this song goes away! 


Well she seemed all right by dawns early light 
Though she looked a little worried and week 
She tried to pretend he wasn't drinkin' again 
But daddy left the proof on her cheek 
And I was only eight years old that summer 
And I always seemed to be in the way 
So I took myself down to the fair in town 
On Independence Day 

Well word gets around in a small, small town 
They said he was a dangerous man 
But mama was proud and she stood her ground 
She knew she was on the losin' end 
Some folks whispered and some folks talked 
But everybody looked the other way 
And when time ran out there was no one about 
On Independence Day 

Let freedom ring, let the white dove sing 
Let the whole world know that today is a day of reckoning 
Let the week be strong, let the right be wrong 
Roll the stone away, let the guilty pay it's Independence Day 

Well she lit up the sky that fourth of July 
By the time that the firemen come 
They just put out the flames, and took down some names 
And sent me to the county home 
Now I ain't sayin' it's right or it's wrong 
But maybe its the only way 
Talk about your revolution 
It's Independence Day 

Let freedom ring, let the white dove sing 
Let the whole world know that today is a day of reckoning 
Let the week be strong, let the right be wrong 
Roll the stone away, let the guilty pay it's Independence Day 
Roll the stone away 
It's Independence day 


i'm thinking of you...

i just got back from the toby keith concert! it was so much fun!!!!! yeah the traffic was terrible and we missed the opening acts, but i don't care. i had so much fun with jordan and shannon. even my mom and gram were having fun. i felt kind of bad, b/c when he played "American Soldier" and "Courtesy of the Red, White, and Blue" my family all started hugging me. i saw my mom was getting kind of sad so i gave her a hug. i didn't want her to see that i was kind of crying. i'm starting to get so nervous about going. i mean, after training i know i'm going to iraq. and that really scares me. i'm so scared that i'm not going to come home....no more sad thoughts for now... my mom bought me a hat at the concert it says "American Soldier". well i'm going to get some sleep i'm so freaking tired! good night ya'll!

thanks alot god. just when i think i can't handle any more pressure you go and do this. why can't you just let her live the rest of her without pain! why do you have to do this now!!!!

I GIVE UP GOD! IS THAT WHAT YOU WANT FROM ME! GOOD LET ME DIE OVER IN IRAQ! GO AHEAD WHAT ELSE DO I HAVE TO LIVE FOR??????

true we may be through now
but that doesn't mean i don't think of you
i tried moving on, but it doesn't work
i need the one who always knew
how to treat a lady.
i can't explain how i felt when i saw you the other day
but i would give everything to again feel that way
i can't live my life without you in it.
even if we're only friends
even though you think i'm the worst,
why do i always feel like i'm cursed
you're gonna move on and find that perfect girl.
while i end up all alone in my own little world
i could never tell you any of this in person.
because i know how much of a chicken i am.
i thought i could get past those feelings i had,
but they all came back when i saw you walking through the door.
good luck with life, even though i know you won't need it....
just do me a favor.....

don't forget me

dear pookie,

you call me that....even though it's been so long, it just makes me want to fall in love with you. but i know you wouldn't, and who am i to blame you? even though it would make vanessa very happy. i just can't help but think of all the happy times we did share together. i'm glad to know you still read my journal. i didn't think you would care enough to know what i was up to. it's kind of nice to know that you keep tabs on me, i'm guessing by the time you read this i will be asleep, but maybe that's a good thing. good night hun.

love,
the pretty

gosh just when i think my mind is over everything, i get a big reality check. i was at work today when i saw *him*. i thought i worked through my feelings for him. boy i was so wrong! he walked in, and i had those butterflies again. not like it matters, he doesn't care for me that way. which is fine. i mean it's not like i'm going to see him very often anyway. what's a girl to do!
just a quick update for ya'll. school is going well, i've been getting A's on all my assignments. work is well work! lol oh well enough of that. later ya'll

In an attempt to update my journal regularly, I decided tonite would be a good night for an update. I finally had a day off from work, thank goodness. It seemed like I have so much homework to do and not enough time to do it in! I gave my presentation for speech today, I don't think it went too bad. Andrew keeps calling me and it's really bugging me. The more I think about it, the more I really don't want to talk to him. He's too much to handle, he reminds me of someone else and I don't want to think about him! And no, it's not who you are probably thinking of! He called me about 20 times in the past 45 minutes. He really got to me today, first I was talking about how my car needs new shocks, so what does he do? He climbs in top of my car and starts bouncing on it. Then we're sitting in his truck on our break between classes and he starts to get all close to me, which I'm the type of person where if I don't want to be touched I will make it known, and I did today. But of course that didn't stop him! I wanted to just start screaming at him, but I just kept it inside and told him I was leaving. It just bugs me that he always has to be around. He waits for me after my 2 o'clock class on tuesday and thursday. I tried explaining to him, that on my days off, I like to get home asap so I can finish up on homework/reading and relax, b/c i don't get too anymore. He bought me flowers yesterday, which is all fine and good but he kept trying to kiss me while I was at work. Now that really pissed me off b/c we work together, and he knows that if my manager would have saw that, I would have gotten in trouble! I really think he just looks for reasons to get me yelled at! Why won't he just leave me alone!?!?! Anyway other than that, my day was fine. I think I spotted Tyler walking across the parking lot today. I would have went over to talk to him, but you know who was practically glued to my side! Oh well, I better go. I still have work to do! Later ya'll!

well where should i start....classes are going alright. i have a test tomorrow in computers, a test next tuesday in inter. algebra, and a presentation due on thursday for speech. the presentation isn't too bad, it's one of those get to know the class type things. which of course to me sounds real childish, but whatever it's an easy A. work is going pretty good. granted i pretty much just change watch batteries, but it's still better than being a cashier. love life? well we'll just let that one go for now. :) my birthday is coming up soon. truth be told, i really don't care about my birthday. i might as well just work. it's a sunday so i'll get paid more, the only bad thing is that everyone will announce it over the PA, and i could do without that. well, i guess i should get to bed or something....good night ya'll

and in case you were wondering 120 days til i leave for basic!
sweetie, if you want to know something about me just ask me. don't go asking other people, i'm not going to bite your head off or anything. that is all

well i talked to him today. it was kind of nice, but still very awkward at the same time. i know he doesn't know how i feel about him, unless he's been reading my journal which i doubt. i can understand if he wants nothing to do with me, but why send me an e-mail out of the blue. granted it was a forward, but still. i just don't know what to think...

sorry for the lack of posts, but what can i say? summer for me has come to an end. as usual it consisted of heart break and adventure. i started at the cube on wednesday, it seems alright so far. it's pretty different from slippery rock. i've already come to the conclusion that i'm not going back to sru...EVER!!! i'm thinking about changing my major too. i doubt i'll stick with social work, i've been thinking about getting into forensic science or criminology, but who knows. my classes seem pretty cool. my speech professor is quite interesting. my assignment for monday? think of 3 positive things about myself to share with the class...what a joke! but that's alright

i finally have my actual departure dates for bmt. i leave january 4th and will graduate in february or march and then i'll have 2 weeks off before i start tech school. which as long as everything goes well i'll be home by april 25. 

i got a new job. well not quite i still work at wal mart, i just work in the jewelry department now. it's twenty cents more an hour and i don't have to deal with as many customers as i do when i'm cashiering. 

well i'm off to bed. i'm tired and i have to work tomorrow....

oh and by the way.... i'm thinking of you too sweetie...

you act like you were some high and mighty person, but you really weren't. telling me that you should have let me end up in a trailer getting beat by my husband...i never thought i could really dislike someone as much as i dislike you right now. right now, you're right i don't want anything to do with you. i have absolutely nothing to say to you... i did care about you, but i don't anymore. you make it sound like i tried to hurt you on purpose, but i really didn't. calling me dreams crap...yeah that sounds supportive. so as far as i'm concerned we really don't need to talk to each other anymore. bye.

well it's official as of 12:45 on 10 July 2004!!! i am in the air froce reserve. i leave for bmt sometime after january 3. i'm so excited i got my job, medical admin. plus i'll be going in with rank, so i'm happy!!! oh well, i g/2/g time for work.

well i just got home from pittsburgh. i had my asvab and physical this morning. i have things narrowed down to three jobs mental health technician, health service management, or traffic management. i need to meet with dawn again tomorrow to figure out which i want to do...well i guess i'll go, but if you wanna chat im me

i'm really beginning to just hate everyone and everything. i can't wait til i get out of kings, i think justin is determined to kill me! lately it seems that more people, who i thought were good friends, just can't seem to keep my name out of their mouths. go ahead talk about me all you want, b/c you weren't my friend in the first place. i'm ready to just give up on everything. i just can't seem to make anyone happy anymore. if i join the af people are mad, if i don't it join it seems people will be mad. i just don't know what to do anymore. i'm ready to just give up on everything. oh well....time to go be miserable some more, before i go back to work.

Well I guess I haven't given a real update in a while. There isn't much going on around here I guess. Dave comes home from london on saturday. I'm talking to the Air Force Reserves recruiter tonite with my parents. Suprisingly they think it's a good idea! I still haven't decided anything yet, but who knows. Tomorrow I get to take my drug test so I can start working at wal mart. I can't wait to get out of kings. All they do is screw me over. But it's time for me to go. Here goes nothing! Later ya'll!

today didn't turn out as planned! i worked this morning at 10. i guess that wasn't so bad. we were so freaking busy though! then i find out that i have to work til 5 instead of 4, which normally i wouldn't have cared, but i made plans today. so my other manager lets me out at 4, which is just one more reason that vic is awesome. so i get home to find out that we weren't going to pittsburgh. all b/c my uncle bill decided to go to see my aunts relatives instead of his own. but whatever. it's my moms birthday today as well. she didn't want to do much since my brother isn't home and b/c it's the first birthday she's celebrated without our gram, which has been really hard on all of us. so i ended up lying around here most of the day and reading my book. i can't wait for tuesday though, i have to call r & d to see if i got the job. *has her fingers crossed hoping she gets the job!*  so anyway my day was kinda boring. my mom informed me that she's going to be buying me a vanity for my room so her and i have to completely redo my bed room. i think it would just be cheaper if i moved out! oh well. tomorrow should be fun. i'm going to a picnic all day, i think. with some of my close friends. oh well. i guess i'll go to bed. good night

i got home from work about an hour ago, and i'm exhausted. buti figured i would give a quick update before bed. 1. i hate working at kings! 2. i'm slowly realizing that i don't really know who i am as a person. i really thought i did. but i don't. i think i need just a little vacation by myself. i think i just need to clear my head and realize what i truely want out of life. but for now i want sleep. so i'm going to bed. good night ya'll!
